byline.contributor: Shuaib Almosawa reported from Sana, and Kareem Fahim from Cairo. Saeed al Batati contributed reporting from Al Mukalla, Yemen.
byline.original: By SHUAIB ALMOSAWA and KAREEM FAHIM

abstract: Former Yemeni Pres Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi visits country for first time since he was exiled in March; visit appears to be primarily a symbolic reminder of Hadi's authority, as capital city of Sana remains under control of Houthi rebels who drove him from power.
lead_paragraph: It was unclear how long Mr. Hadi, who was pushed out by Houthi rebels, intended to stay in Aden, where he arrived on Tuesday.

headline.main: Abdu Rabbu Mansour Hadi, Deposed President, Returns to Yemen
headline.print_headline: Exiled Yemeni President Returns to Visit His War-Torn Country

snippet: It was unclear how long Mr. Hadi, who was pushed out by Houthi rebels, intended to stay in Aden, where he arrived on Tuesday.
